0.Name: Abigale
0.Description: She gazes to her right at the long road behind her.
0.Speech: Unless you can rustle up a ride outta here, best leave me be.

1.Name: Abigale
1.Speech: I'm tired of the big talker in the saloon.

2.Name: Abigale
2.Speech: Maybe you could give 'em a scare that'd send 'em runnin' till the cows come home.

0.Description: How will you convince Abigale to skip town?

1.Name: Abigale
1.Speech: If I ever strike it rich, I'll send some gold your way

2.Name: Abigale
2.Description: A displeased sigh escapes her mouth.
